persona_titles.title: patient
persona_titles.description: Patient (or resident) who owns the care workflow and can delegate tasks.

persona_titles.title: caregiver
persona_titles.description: Family member who can coordinate administrative steps for a patient when delegated.

persona_titles.title: nurse
persona_titles.description: Nurse who can execute workflow items on behalf of a patient, if explicitly delegated.

persona_titles.title: doctor
persona_titles.description: Doctor with a caring relationship, if explicitly delegated.

persona_titles.title: care-coordinator
persona_titles.description: Care coordinator who can manage discharge/admin tasks when delegated.

persona_titles.title: user-admin
persona_titles.description: Supra-level administrator with full permissions to update personas of other users.
